New Records: Dawid Malan scored 140 from 107 balls with 16 fours and 5 sixes against Bangladesh in the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023
Key Match Events: England won the match against Bangladesh, getting points on the board for the defending champions after a disappointing showing first-time out against New Zealand
Pre-Game Insights: Malan was often called to be dropped due to occasional slow starts in the England T20 set-up, but his ODI record should be beyond reproach
Post-Match Reflections: Malan said he feels like every series he's under pressure, and for him to keep silencing people is all he can do
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's win moved them up to fifth in the table with still plenty of work to do to recover from that early loss to New Zealand and reach the final four
Others: Malan averages a world-class 63.15 after his 23 ODIs to-date
